text: 380px Madonna and Child is an oil on panel painting by Giovanni Antonio Boltraffio, now in the National Gallery, London. It was probably produced in the 1490s. It is influenced by Leonardo da Vinci, derived from Boltraffio's time in that artist's Milanese studio. ==References== category:Paintings of the Madonna and Child category:Collections of the National Gallery, London category:Paintings by Giovanni Antonio Boltraffio category:1490s paintings
title: Madonna and Child (Boltraffio)
